attributes.action: Allow other holders of African driving licences to 'swap' for UK licences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Can anyone tell me why only South African and Zimbabwean driving licence holders, excluding other African licence holders, can 'swap' their licences for UK ones, without having to take either the UK theory or practical test?
The practice smacks of discrimination and should stop; if it's about 'corruption' does the UK Govt not realise that corruption also exists in SA and Zim? ALL FOR ONE AND ONE FOR ALL!
